Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.spring.boot.starter.test

Interface TestWithKnownCurrentApplicationContext

@TestExecutionListeners(value=CurrentApplicationContextTestExecutionListener.class, mergeMode=MERGE_WITH_DEFAULTS) public interface TestWithKnownCurrentApplicationContext
This is the marker which is useful for any test runner except JUnit5. It allows applying CurrentApplicationContextTestExecutionListener with other TestExecutionListener's of implementor regardless its inheritance.
